SELECT * FROM board
WHERE boardid = #boardid#
ORDER BY boardid DESC
sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO board (`userid`, `title`, `content`, `createuser`, `createdt`, `modiuser`, `modidt`) VALUES (#userid#, #title#, #content#, #createuser#, #createdt#, #modiuser#, #modidt#)
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() as boardid
sqlMap.update: UPDATE board SET title = #title#, content = #content#, modiuser = #modiuser#, modidt = #modidt# WHERE boardid = #boardid#
